div.head: 產後陰翻澤蘭產後陰翻，產後陰戶燥熱，遂成翻花
div.div: turning inside out of the yin [gate] following delivery Turn ing inside out of the yin [gate] following delivery

form.orth: 產後陰翻澤蘭產後陰翻，產後陰戶燥熱，遂成翻花
form.pron: Chan hou yin fan BCGM ze lan BHJJF
form.usg: [1] PC with a woman’s birth canal everted to the outside following delivery.
